metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40149 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: Those using Jettison to parse untrusted XML or JSON data may be vulnerable to Denial of Service attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on user supplied input, an attacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash by stackoverflow. This effect may support a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: libjettison-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
